extendedInfo.description: ** THIS IS NOT A GAME, ONLY INSTALL IF YOU HAVE A COPY OF NHL 12 FOR EITHER XBOX360, PS3 OR PC **If you like this, please support further development by donating. You can do so by getting the NHL 12 Tracker donate/unlocker. NHL 12 Tracker is a tool which makes it possible to track you and your friends results, statistics and standings for ranked online matches in the excellent game NHL 12 from Electronic Arts. * Recent match list with team logos.* Leaderboard for you and your friends, who is the best?* Detailed statistics for each player.* Compare your own statistics against other players. * What is the current form (last 10 matches) for a player?* Notifications - Get notified when your friends have played (this feature is only active in the donate/unlocked version).The ads in the app can be removed by buying the donate/unlocker for NHL 12 Tracker. Please note that we're not affilated with EA in any way. This is a game made by a NHL 12 freak for other NHL 12 freaks.Also notice that EA doesn't provide a stable API to get matches and statistics. Therefore NHL 12 Tracker might not work properly if something changes at the EA servers. In that case please be patient while we try to catch up with the changes.Legal Disclaimer: This app is not an official app or connected to the gameâs developer or publisher. All in-game descriptions, logos, characters, locations and imagery are copyright to their respective owners, and usage for this game guide falls within fair use guidelines and/or in accordance with the lisence which they were released.Explanation of required permissions:* INTERNET *Needed to be able to download latest NHL 12 data.* WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE *Used for caching of avatars and team logos.* ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE *Needed to be able to check whether internet is available or not.* READ_PHONE_STATE * Required by the MobClix advertisement API to work.All the following teams are supported:Anaheim DucksWinnipeg JetsBoston BruinsBuffalo SabresCalgary FlamesCarolina HurricanesChicago BlackhawksColorado AvalancheColumbus Blue JacketsDallas StarsDetroit Red WingsEdmonton reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app but I don\'t see the team logos in recent matches. Needs to be updated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incomplete
reviews.comment: Solid but HUT is not featured.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dumb
reviews.comment: U have to rewrite our friends list every time I close it and go back into it.....it could be cool though but needs an update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its a good app,  needs one change
reviews.comment: This app works great for me,  but I wish it supported HUT with all of HUT\'s features,  like being able to change your lines and make or watch trades,  something like the nhl 13 app, would give an easy 5 stars.
reviews.author: John Jarowicz

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: All it needs it the gamer level.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very cool for checking out your own and your friends stats when you are away from your PS3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good app but Hockey Ultimate Team needs to be integrated. I would love to be able to monitor my card sales and put other cards up for sale, all while being away from my XBOX.
reviews.author: A Google User
